title: Best Oven Fried Chicken
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Liberally grease a baking sheet with butter.
Crush the cornflakes and combine them with the Parmesan in a shallow dish. You can also add more of the spices to this mixture too if desired.
Coat each tender in the mayo mixture, then coat them in the cornflake mixture.
Place on the greased pan and drizzle with the butter. Bake for about 20 minutes or until the center reaches 165 degrees.
To make the creamy honey mustard dipping sauce, combine all ingredients in a bowl. Serve baked chicken with honey mustard sauce.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons melted butter (plus more for greasing the pan)
For the creamy honey mustard dipping sauce
